DOC.brief_summary: The study pilot study adolescents 12 - 18 year age mild moderate depression randomize receive either hypericum 250mg twice daily fluoxetine 10mg daily increase 20mg daily 1 week option increase 40mg daily 4 week . Patients treat total 8 week . Efficacy measure use CDRS-R , BDI-II CGI scale . Safety parameter include blood test , urinalysis ECG .
